programme.desc: A young family searches for a home that's close to where they board their horse in Denver. She wants a farmhouse feel with plenty of room for her beloved dining room table, but he's looking for a smaller living space and wants a three-car garage.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: Dave and Jenny reveal details behind the making of the episode and share fun facts as a couple who loves New Orleans-style architecture asks them to transform their classic Craftsman into a Creole cottage.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: After overcoming health issues, a family purchased a house on the lake and hoped to make it their forever home. They started renovations themselves and realized they needed help, so they call on Dave and Jenny to transform it into their dream lake home.

programme.title: Fixer to Fabulous
programme.desc: A woman made an offer on a 1902 house, and her husband thinks it’s too outdated. Dave and Jenny work to renovate it while preserving its original charm.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: A couple wants to quit their day jobs in hopes of earning a massive return on a dilapidated Los Angeles Craftsman. A shared driveway and stress from a hard-money loan complicate the flip, and the couple calls on Tarek El Moussa to get it back on track.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: A 19 year old ignores his family's pleas to go to college to start his real estate investment career. An investor agreed to let him take lead on a flip, and Tarek must coach him to be fearless when facing an $80,000 renovation.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Alison and Mondo are amateur flippers who have not only taken on the worst house on the block, but the worst house Tarek has ever seen.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: A couple is tired of mediocre profits and asks Tarek to help with their next flip in Anaheim, CA. Even with his guidance, they struggle to make the right decisions and face an uphill battle when the local market starts to buck.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: A couple that flipped a home with Tarek in the past must call on him again after buying a home with stalactites on the ceilings and competition nearby. When Tarek learns they didn't call the city about permits, he doubts whether the project can be saved.

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa

programme.title: Flipping 101 With Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Tarek mentors real estate novices to help them learn the secrets of a successful flip.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony and Lucky take on the legendary Aussie engine, the beastly 4.0L turbocharged inline six Ford Barra. The guys think Chevrolet might have just built something better in the similar-sized Vortec 4200.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony Angelo and Lucky Costa revive one of the most popular HRG builds ever, the Crown Hick. This do-everything shop truck is really a 2007 Crown Victoria Police Interceptor dressed up as a 1966 F-100.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony Angelo and Lucky Costa decide to build a boat of a car, a 1971 Cadillac Sedan deVille, and drop it on airbags for a sweet-and-low cruiser. The Caddy, however, had other plans.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony Angelo and Lucky Costa give the lowdown on drag racing! Watch the guys take our 10-second turbo Camaro project and a bone-stock 1986 Ford Thunderbird Turbo Coupe, prep them for action, and hit the racetrack.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony and Lucky transform their '71 Sedan DeVille into a rolling party machine. They'll add full electronic controls and a nitrous oxide system, and with the flip of a few switches, it drops to the ground into full-on cruise mode.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony and Lucky bring a 1986 Ford Thunderbird Turbo Coupe into the 21st century. After adding new turbo technology and a modern computer system, they'll see if the 2.3 L Pinto engine can hang with its recent EcoBoost descendant.

programme.desc: The Vette Kart has proven itself worthy on autocross, big track, dragstrip, sand dune and stunt courses. Now the guys are testing the Kart's rallying capabilities against champion drifter Chris Forsberg and a RallyPro Subaru WRX.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: A 1970 Corvette was in storage for thirty years and Dan discovers that the car needs a ton of work. A 1964 GTO was smashed in an accident and totaled by his insurance company, Dan agrees to try and bring his mangled GTO back to life.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: After a nationwide search to find the best metal fabrication prospects around, Dave Kindig and KevDogg have invited 12 people to the shop to compete for one job at Kindig-It Design.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: Dave and KevDogg keep the pressure on, as the remaining competitors pair up for a challenge to create a signature Kindig-It build feature. Teamwork is critical, and the team that can't figure it out will pack their bags.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: The competition is quickly getting more difficult. Dave and Kev divide the group into two teams, and explain the day's assignment, navigating a tricky exhaust challenge, with the losing team having to make a difficult choice.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: The day's first exercise is to take an hour and see if they are more of a Dave or Kev artist. Next, project managers are chosen from the group and tasked to lead a team to design and execute a wing on a '68 Camaro trunk lid.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: It's every contestant for themselves now, starting with a rusted out, dented fender that needs repair. At the last minute, Dave and Kev throw a major-league curveball after they decide that the challenge is a little too easy.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: The ultimate job interview is down to four candidates, and the next test will see how well they can handle a staple project at Kindig-It Design. Even with the instructions available, this challenge is not as easy as it looks.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: Dave challenges the remaining three players to fabricate a grill from design to execution. The winners will get a spot in the finale.

programme.title: Bitchin' Bootcamp
programme.desc: The final two contestants take on one last job at Kindi-It, but Dave and Kev throw them another curveball.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: A 1970 Corvette was in storage for thirty years and Dan discovers that the car needs a ton of work. A 1964 GTO was smashed in an accident and totaled by his insurance company, Dan agrees to try and bring his mangled GTO back to life.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: When Andy Cohen decides to transplant a Dodge Hell Cat engine into his classic Plymouth Barracuda, it's all hands-on deck. But even his best guys can't promise it'll work. Then Bobby tries to salvage two beat-up ATVs without losing any money.

programme.desc: A Chevy Tri-Five that's been in the family for decades hasn't moved in 17 years. Two brothers join the Squad to try and get this 4-wheel family member back on the road.

programme.desc: The KTM Super Duke and the Bentley Flying Spur are featured.

programme.desc: Mike and Ant bring a 1974 Fiat 1/9, a mid-engine sports car, into the workshop. There's hardly any rust on it but there's a can of worms behind the driver's seat.

programme.desc: Mike and Ant work on a 1968 International Harvester Travelall, an ancestor of the modern SUV.

programme.title: Faster With Finnegan
programme.desc: The guys take their big red K5 Blazer to the West Georgia Mud Park to take on a local racer. After finding numerous issues with the Blazer, they decide the best way to add more power for cheap is a good ol' LS swap.

programme.title: FantomWorks
programme.desc: A U-Haul full of parts and a dream of a perfect Plymouth Business Coupe shows up at the shop. Dan also has to find a 1972 Gran Sport and to then restore it with hard-to-find features that now have to work together on the same car.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy Cohen and his dad restore a Jeep Wrangler and an '86 Monte Carlo.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike finds a rare beast; a 1976 Mark 2 Mercury Capri with the classic 2.8-liter Cologne V6. It's not without its problems, which means Ant has to completely overhaul the engine, the interior, and his own design upgrade.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike finds a true Swedish Unicorn of the car world: a '95 Volvo 850 T-5R, a station wagon with a racing pedigree. Unfortunately, the Turbo in the T-5R is in need of TLC, and some creative thinking from the guys is needed to solve the bodywork issues.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike gets his hands on the Japanese Ferrari, also known as a 1991 Toyota MR2 Turbo. One small fix becomes a big problem for Ant as the entire engine has to be removed but at least it gives him the chance to deal with even more problems along the way.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike finds a 2002 Chevrolet Corvette Z06 with over 400 hp and zero to sixty in under four seconds. It's a road-legal race car, but Ant is less than enthused when he realizes the scale of the work needed to help it regain those impressive numbers.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike tracks down a rare '91 Alfa Romeo 164L. He loves the look of this car but Ant has his work cut out for him. This Alpha has perfect bodywork, but it has a leaking engine, faulty steering, dodgy brakes, and a host of other issues.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Golf GTi was a symbol of the 80s, and gave birth to the term 'hot hatch'. Mike finds a prime example of a Rabbit which he believes can be transformed. The market is crying out for cars like this, but Ant has a lot of work to do.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Dodge SRT 10 truck has an 8.3 liter V10 Viper engine, and Mike finds one at a price he can't resist. Once Ant is sold on the plan, they dive in, working to make this vehicle powerful enough to dominate on a NASCAR track.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The housemates pack up their hair extensions and their Shore Store t-shirts and jet off to Italy for a European adventure. But the culture shock that awaits them is nothing compared to their shocking new hook-ups.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Deena and Pauly consider the consequences should they smush, while Mike tries to take his friendship with Snooki to the next level. At the club, Ron and Sammi try to be friends but prove that old habits, both good and bad, die hard.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: With twins in the mix, it's double trouble as bi-curious Deena pulls the robbery on Mike and Vinny. Plus Mike's secret hook-up with Snooki is revealed. Is Snooki a cheater or is The Situation just trying to start drama.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The boys harass Deena for stealing a girl from Vinny's bed, leading her to anxiety and self doubt about her relationship with the roommates. Ronnie and Sam are back to their old ways, but this time Mike is involved in their mess.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: After causing drama between Ron and Sam for years, Mike comes to blows with Ronnie and ends up getting carried out on a stretcher.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: Pauly and Vinny put on a 'Guido-themed' comedy show, while Ron and Sam work once again to patch things up. Snooki becomes so distraught over her rollercoaster long-distance relationship that Jenni and Sam decide to intervene.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: When the roommates take a trip to the Italian Shore, Snooki and Deena party so hard they wind up in bed together. And when everyone returns to Florence, Team Meatballs literally have a run in with the Italian police.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The boys spring Team Meatballs from the police station after their accident. And when Snooki's true love Jionni comes to visit, what starts as a romantic evening ends with a sobbing Snooki alone in the streets of Florence.

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files

programme.title: NASA's Unexplained Files

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: New discoveries reveal the secrets of Egypt's tomb raiders, and what ancient Egyptians did to ensure the treasures of their dead pharaohs wouldn't be stolen. The latest science answers these great mysteries, shedding new light on Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Mysterious tomb carvings provide dark evidence that ancient Egyptians practiced cannibalism, but we don't know why. New discoveries might finally answer this ancient mystery, and experts use modern-day tech to reveal more of Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: When experts unearth a mysterious lost city built by an infamous pharaoh, they find clues of a grisly catastrophe. New discoveries reveal the apocalyptic events that turned this place into hell on earth, offering more clues to Egypt's darkest secrets.

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files

programme.desc: Rob investigates a cluster of ancient ruins in New England that suggest Europeans arrived in the Americas almost 1,000 years before Columbus. Then, he heads to California where a dormant super volcano may be showing new signs of life.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob Nelson descends into a cave 30 feet beneath Texas in search of evidence of a mass extinction event. Then, he heads to Lake Michigan to investigate an unexplained, Bermuda Triangle-like phenomenon that has caused ships to disappear for centuries.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob hunts for a legendary mass grave that could expose a dark secret of America's industrial past. High in the mountains, a giant lake is mysteriously disappearing, and Rob uses cutting-edge technology to find out why.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Rob explores mysterious tunnels beneath Denver's airport, the capitol building, and downtown to investigate rumors of a secret organization that operates below. In Ohio, he tries to uncover the ancient secrets of a giant mound shaped like a serpent.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: A legendary train filled with stolen Nazi gold is said to be hidden in Poland. Using cutting-edge technology, Rob Nelson and Stefan Burns explore deep underneath the earth's surface and in abandoned Nazi tunnels in search for the infamous legend.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Priceless gold and silver artifacts are believed to be in the fabled lost Temple Treasures of Jerusalem and King Solomon's hidden mines. With unprecedented access, Rob Nelson and Stefan Burns use the latest technology to search for the legendary treasure.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: Millions of dollars of stolen Gold Rush treasure is rumored to have been stashed in a cave in Northern California. Rob Nelson and Stefan Burns use cutting-edge technology to search for the legendary treasure.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: New theories claim that the legendary sunken city of Atlantis could have actually been in the Americas. Rob Nelson and Stefan Burns use cutting-edge technology to investigate evidence that might shed more light on one of the world's greatest mysteries.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: When an infamous pirate city sunk into the sea after a massive earthquake, a wealthy pirate's treasure might have disappeared with it. Rob and Stefan use cutting-edge technology to hunt for the treasure of Henry Morgan.

programme.title: Secrets of the Underground
programme.desc: A strange cave freezes in the summer and melts in the winter, and a massive sand dune swallows a small child in an instant. Rob Nelson and Stefan Burns use cutting-edge technology to investigate these mysteries of the natural world.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: The winter is off to a bad start when a major blizzard slams the Coquihalla Highway. Jamie Davis' heavy rescue team spends the morning clearing semis off the road when word comes that a multi-vehicle pile-up has closed down both northbound lanes.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Last year, Jamie ordered a state-of-the-art heavy rescue truck called a Rotator, but the busy winter season is here and the custom-built wrecker still hasn't been delivered. Jamie heads to the factory in Tennessee to bring it home himself.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie's having second thoughts about bringing his son Brandon on-board; right-hand man Kevin shows up at a wreck without the gear he needs to control traffic and Jamie's one bright spot is his brand-new truck, the Rotator.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: To keep up with a busy season, Jamie hires on a new guy who turns out to be to a slow learner, and then goes AWOL during a major blizzard.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie isn't the only tow guy on the Coq. Lone wolf, Al Quiring, is a tough-as-nails wrecker and Jamie's main rival and when the Rotator lands in the shop during an especially busy week, Al uses it as a chance to scoop a job away Jamie.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: With the Coq closed overnight, trucks are using the back roads to get through. Jamie's team is called out to recover a semi that went over the cliff on rural Highway three. The next day is a battle on all fronts to get the Coq open.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Kevin buys a video camera so he can film wrecks, but his new hobby starts to get in the way of his current job. A head-on collision between two semis has the entire crew battling to clear the charred wreckage and get the road open.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: With spring coming, Jamie is facing a backlog of bills and heavy pressure to cut costs by laying off some of his staff. And a long season has everyone's tempers on edge.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie and his entire crew travel along to Beer O'Clock, where they trade stories about the season past, and face tough questions about the season to come.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: The crew tackles their toughest recovery so far this season when they have to pull a smashed SUV up a sheer 400-metre cliff; Jamie offers stepson Brandon a chance to drive his own tow truck but needs to teach the teenager how to drive standard.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie must keep a wrecked load of wood chips from busting open all over the highway; Ken tries to recruit Brandon into car towing; a fully loaded Sea-Can container flips, blocking Highway 3.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Tensions between Jamie and Adam boil over as they struggle to flip a B-train on a narrow icy road; a two-car collision closes the snow shed and puts Ken's towing know-how to the test; a truckload of Christmas mail nearly goes off a cliff.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: A trailer filled with pharmaceuticals gets embedded in a block of ice. A truckload of frozen chickens crashes into a tangle of trees. Sixty-five-year-old Bruce begins to show signs that he may be over the hill.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: The biggest storm of the season is about to hit the Coq, just as Jamie discovers that his licence has expired. His day gets even worse when someone smashes the Rotator.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Heavy rescue recovers a severely damaged trailer loaded with millions of plastic beads. Spring rains cause rock slides on Highway 1. When a B-train loaded with lumber drives off a cliff in order to avoid a boulder, Jamie's called in to recover it.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Jamie is powerless to help when a sudden winter storm slams British Columbia. Two of Heavy Rescue’s crew face a life-or-death situation on a logging road. Adam calls for back up when can't budge a truck that is flipped over a bank.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: In British Columbia, a truck full of wine is sliced in half. Howie is left to tackle his recovery on his own. Al Quiring and Adam Gazzola deal with wrecks on two separate highways.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: After lumber spills across a busy highway, Howie faces an impossible challenge. In northern Alberta, the crew puts the Rotator to the test dealing with heavy industrial wrecks in extreme weather.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: Pipe trucks that have rolled over in Alberta and B.C. have crews in both places to open vital highways. A trailer with thousands of bottles of hot sauce jams and is ripped open. Jamie and Brandon compete in a car race on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Highway Thru Hell
programme.desc: A massive build up of snow on the Coq means Avalanches are imminent if something isn’t done fast. In Alberta, Adam and Brandon face off in a clash that will change the course of the winter season.

programme.desc: Melissa has spent years trying to cover a huge lipoma with a sweatshirt. Tyler's cancer fears have prevented him from having his huge head lumps examined. Tahj is plagued by painful boils. Amber has ear keloids that can no longer be ignored.

programme.title: Unpolished

programme.desc: Ethan is left speechless after Olivia gets a body piercing. Ethan and Olivia host Micah and Moriah for their first ever Independence Day. Kim, Barry and the kids head back to the farm to welcome visitors from down under.

programme.title: Welcome to Plathville

programme.title: Welcome to Plathville
programme.desc: Lydia confides in Kim about her secret crush. Ethan jets off to Los Angeles to meet up with Olivia for a much-needed vacation away from Cairo, Georgia. Then, Lydia is in for some surprises when she joins Moriah for a girls' night.

programme.title: Welcome to Plathville

programme.title: My 600-lb Life
programme.desc: At nearly 1,000 pounds, Samantha is dangerously close to dying. To make matters worse, she's paid to eat by making videos online. If Samantha doesn't overcome her toxic relationship with food, she worries that she will leave her daughter motherless.
